text.div:
ServiceProvisionConditions

The code(s) that detail the conditions under which the healthcare service is available/offered.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/service-provision-conditions defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
free FreeThis service is available for no patient cost.
disc Discounts AvailableThere are discounts available on this service for qualifying patients.
cost Fees applyFees apply for this service.

name: ServiceProvisionConditions
description: The code(s) that detail the conditions under which the healthcare service is available/offered.

concept.definition: This service is available for no patient cost.
There are discounts available on this service for qualifying patients.
